sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMM_BOARD (CODE, BOARD_SEQ, USER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, ATCH_FILE_ID) VALUES(#code#,SEQ_COMM_BOARD.NEXTVAL,#userId#,#boardTitle#, SYSDATE, #boardContent#, #atchFileId#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT BB.* FROM (SELECT AA.*, ROWNUM FROM (SELECT CODE code ,BOARD_SEQ boardSeqNum ,USER_ID userId ,BOARD_TITLE boardTitle ,BOARD_DATE boardDate ,BOARD_CONTENT boardContent ,ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId ,BOARD_HITS boardHitsNumber ,BOARD_DELETE boardDelete FROM TB_COMM_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC) AA)BB WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstRecNo# and #lastRecNo#

select CODE code ,BOARD_SEQ boardSeqNum ,USER_ID userId ,BOARD_TITLE boardTitle ,BOARD_DATE boardDate ,BOARD_CONTENT boardContent ,ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId ,BOARD_HITS boardHitsNumber ,BOARD_DELETE boardDelete FROM TB_COMM_BOARD where user_id = #userId#
